articles.author: Christopher Brito
articles.title: Mayoral candidate says London can host 2020 Olympics
articles.description: "We have the infrastructure and the experience," Shaun Bailey said. "And due to the #coronavirus outbreak, the world might need us to step up."
articles.content:
A London mayoral candidate says the city can host the 2020 Summer Olympics. 
"We have the infrastructure and the experience. And due to the #coronavirus outbreak, the world might need us to step up," Shaun Bailey, the mayoral candidate for the Conservative P… [+1708 chars]

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Drop in new virus cases reported after diagnostic criteria change
articles.description: Chinese authorities reported 394 new cases in the latest 24-hour span, down sharply from the 1,749 reported the day before.
articles.content: For the second time in a week, China has changed the way it diagnosis new cases of the coronavirus, resulting in a huge drop in reported cases on Thursday. Chinese authorities reported 394 new cases over the previous 24 hours, down sharply from the 1,749 new … [+1050 chars]
